to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.contract

Interface IAccessoryCommunication

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessoryCommunication

    public interface IAccessoryCommunication
extends java.io.Closeable
    The interface to communicate with µController.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adjustSpeed(float speed)
      Adjust the speed of the car.
      CarFeatures getCarFeatures()
      Returns the Features of the Car, that was send by the µController.
      void requestBatteryState()
      Tell the µController to send information about the battery state.
      void rotateCamera(float pan, float tilt)
      Rotates the camera (if supported).
      void setListener(IAccessoryCommunicationListener listener)
      Sets the Listener that want to now, when something happens here.
      void startCommunication()
      Starts the communication thread, so we can send messages and receive the answer.
      void turnCar(float rotation)
      Change the rotation of the "steering wheel".

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • startCommunication

        void startCommunication()
                        throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Starts the communication thread, so we can send messages and receive the answer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If no listener was set with setListener(to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.contract.IAccessoryCommunicationListener).

      • getCarFeatures

        CarFeatures getCarFeatures()
                           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Returns the Features of the Car, that was send by the µController.
        Returns:
        CarFeatures
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Is thrown, before IAccessoryCommunicationListener.connectionInitialized() is called. (Until now we have no features received from µController.)

      • adjustSpeed

        void adjustSpeed(float speed)
        Adjust the speed of the car.
        Parameters:
        speed - AdjustSpeedMessage.speed

      • turnCar

        void turnCar(float rotation)
        Change the rotation of the "steering wheel".
        Parameters:
        rotation - TurnCarMessage.rotation

      • rotateCamera

        void rotateCamera(float pan,
                float tilt)
        Rotates the camera (if supported).
        Parameters:
        pan - RotateCameraMessage.pan
        tilt - RotateCameraMessage.tilt

      • requestBatteryState

        void requestBatteryState()
        Tell the µController to send information about the battery state.

      • setListener

        void setListener(IAccessoryCommunicationListener listener)
        Sets the Listener that want to now, when something happens here. It is possible to change it every time.
        Parameters:
        listener - IAccessoryCommunicationListener
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If listener is null.
